name: Cricket Champs Indian League - Super Over
name_original: Cricket Champs Indian League - Super Over
description:
** The Most Challenging Cricket Game - Indian League Edition **
It’s all about shot selection and timing but only a Legend can hit a six every ball.

Choose your team and face the world’s best bowlers.

** Super Over **
Consists of one over in each match. You will be given a target that has to be chased down in one over. A successful completion will allow you to unlock the next match. Get all stars to unlock & challenge the best ALL STAR team in the world.
